content.rendered:
The following are the various versions of WordPress, listed chronologically from the oldest to newest, along with the Change Log information on new features and improvements in each version.

NOTE: WordPress core developers share a love of jazz music, and since WordPress 1.0, all major releases are named in honor of jazz musicians they admire.

Released Versions

Version 0.7

Version 1.0

Version 1.2

Version 1.5

Version 2.0

Version 2.1

Version 2.2

Version 2.3

Version 2.5

Version 2.6

Version 2.7

Version 2.8

Version 2.9

Version 3.2

Version 3.4

Version 3.5

Version 3.6

Version 3.7

Version 3.8

Version 3.9

Version 4.1

Version 4.2

Version 5.9

Version 6.0

Version 6.2

Version 6.3

Version 6.4

Version 6.5

Version 6.6

Version 6.7

Version 6.8

Planned Versions

There are no plans for major releases during 2025.  Follow changes in progress for the next major version in our bug tracker.

See Also

  • WordPress Roadmap
  • Blog Releases Archive
  • Download Release Archive

Changelog:

  • 2025-08-05 Added maintenance releases for 6.7.3, 6.6.3, 6.5.6, 6.4.6, 6.3.6, 6.2.7, 6.1.8, 6.0.10, 5.9.11, 5.8.11, 5.7.13, 5.6.15, 5.5.16, 5.4.17, 5.3.19, 5.2.22, 5.1.20, 5.0.23, 4.9.27, 4.8.26, 4.7.30
  • 2025-07-15 Added 6.8.2 maintenance release and final release for versions 4.1 to 4.6
  • 2025-04-30 Added WP 6.8.1 maintenance release.
  • 2025-04-15 Added 6.8 “Cecil”
  • 2024-11-21 Added WP 6.7.1 maintenance release.
  • 2024-11-12 Added WP 6.7 “Rollins”
  • 2024-08-02 Added missing minor versions
  • 2024-07-16 Added WP 6.6 “Dorsey”
  • 2021-07-20 Added WP 5.8 “Tatum”
  • 2021-05-17 Correction of the artist’s name for version 5.7
